data.title: The Royal Plantagenets and The Toneys
data.meta_description: The Royal Plantagenets and the Toneys - Free download as Open Office file (.odt), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses the royal connections of the Toney family to the Plantagenet dynasty through multiple marriages between the 11th and 12th centuries. It details how Ralph de Toney III's daughter married Baldwin, a leader of the First Crusade who later became King of Jerusalem. It also describes marriages between the Toney and Montfort families that further linked them to the kings of France and England. The document traces this royal lineage over several generations, highlighting individuals like Bertrade de Montfort who married the king of France and Fulk V who became king of Jerusalem.
data.text: The Royal Plantagenets and The Toneys
